version_description: NEW: Test configurations added. Now you can configure the test by providing your charger info, wire info and adding custom comments. This information can be exported after the tests are done for filtering and any advanced analysis.

Bug fixes:
* Test name and charger not displayed correctly.
New functionality:
* Editing of already completed tests is added.
* New help screen added.
* Confirmation before deleting all test results added.
minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes
Small translation changes
Bug fix: Keyboard is not hiding on the configuration screen.
Added support for iPhone Xs, iPhone XR, iPhone Xs-MAX
Wattage output added
Added support for new Apple devices.
Completely new design and functionality.
Minor translation changes.
Fixed crash in options. Added optional purchases (nothing required for the functionality). App is fully functional without those.
Optional app purchases were removed. Fixed app crash in settings screen.

Added battery alarm functionality.
Now, battery level alarm, and charge testing can run when the phone is locked.
Fixed few minor bugs.

Added option for automatic screen dimming.
Translation fixes.

Minor user interface changes.
Chinese translation improvements.

Fixed bugs: alarm sound was not working in some situations
Added: new notification will be sent together with the battery level alarm
Translation fixes, added support for new iPads.
Minor interface changes, fixes.
Test results export changed. Now it uses standard iOS share method.
Added wire and charger compare wizards.

Added settings for ignoring charge disconnections during the test.
Added test descriptions for the individual Wizard tests.
Fixed crash issue at the end of Wizard tests.
Added result sorting, translation changes.

Fixes:
Export on iPad devices.
Exported date shown in UTC +0
User settings for battery alert level and sorting are saved now.
Translation changes
Translation changes.
New version is out! New system device information, new user interface!

Added charger voltage customization per test.
Fixed bugs:
If no tests were performed, last test should not contain any data.
Label "seconds" was added for Duration 1% test result to make it more clear what is the meaning of it.
Exporting format for historical tests adjusted.
Added setting to always run app in English.
Added option to customize battery capacity for more precise calculations, when the default battery was replaced or lost some capacity due to the age and usage.

Added support for iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro MAX models.
Support for background execution was removed.
Improved compatibility with iOS 13
Added settings to auto enable battery alarm on app start. Please note, that app have to be open on unlocked device for alarm to work.
Translation fixes.
Fixed issue with extra quick chargers. Translation fixes.
Added functionality to submit test results online. Scores can be compared with other user and device submissions.
Translation and wizard fixes.
Fixed an issue with alarm going off at 100%
Certificate fixes, added wrong test result detection mechanism.
Small bug fixes. Internal API update.
